description: A long, pointed spear fashioned from a razor-sharp stalactite.
A sleek dagger with a blade as dark as the caverns it hails from.
An axe with a head shaped like a geode, sharp crystalline formations line its edge.
A jagged sword with a blade of pure crystal, shimmering with a thousand reflected lights.
A slender, needle-like rapier whose hilt mimics the stalagmites of a silent grotto.
A small, sharp dagger, its handle wrapped in bat leather, perfect for close-quarters combat.
A hefty axe with a head shaped from a boulder cleaved from the heart of a deep chasm.
A sinister scythe with a dark obsidian blade that curves like the wing of a cave-dwelling creature.
A massive hammer with a head forged from the densest rocks found in the deepest caverns.
A sleek, serrated short sword that looks like it was chiseled from underground slate.
A chain-bound flail whose strikes resound through the caverns like a crumbling echo.
A viciously pointed dagger with a grip encrusted in gemstones from the abyss.
A long spear with a tip as sharp as the stalactites adorning ancient cave ceilings.
A mace encrusted with sharp amethyst crystals that fracture on impact, releasing healing energies.
A sleek dagger with a vampiric gemstone hilt that absorbs vitality from foes to heal its wielder.
A dual-purpose mining pick that resonates with life force, striking veins of ore and vitality alike.
A serrated blade made from the chitin of cave creatures, it leeches health with each slice.
A staff topped with a spiraled calcite, channeling restorative frequencies through offensive waves.
A regal scepter tipped with a glowing stalagmite that radiates healing waves through the caverns.
An ancient lantern whose radiant limestone light soothes wounds and calms restless spirits.
A delicate vial filled with healing waters collected from pristine cavern dripstones.
A cloak interwoven with living mycelium that mends flesh as it embraces the wounded.
A wand that releases spores which bloom into healing fungi upon contact with the air.
A pair of gloves that channel the restorative essence of gypsum, mending the wear of battle upon contact.
A staff topped with a silicate crystal cluster that resonates with energy to reinforce protective gear.
A rod that hums with a rhythmic pulse, strengthening the structure of armor with every note.
A small hammer imbued with marble's resilience, capable of knitting together the fissures in any shield.
A palm-sized onyx stone that, when clasped, forms a bond with the bearer's armor, slowly restoring its integrity.
A volatile staff that creates seismic cracks, damaging both the target and the wielder's footing.
A bludgeon that causes a cascade of sharp rocks to fall, threatening friend and foe alike.
A scepter that releases a burst of toxic spores, healing the user but harming all in close proximity.
A spear that siphons strength from foes upon impact, converting their vigor into the wielder's health.
A throwable vial that absorbs a fragment of the enemy's essence to replenish the user's vitality.
A gauntlet that clings to the life force of defeated foes, granting a sliver of their energy to the bearer.
